displaytitle: Bust of a Man facing right

creditline: Bequest of Junius S. Morgan, Class of 1888
markings:
Collector's stamp and signature in brown ink, verso center: Pierre Mariette II (Lugt 1670, Lugt 1789)

Collector's stamp in brown ink, verso center left: A.F. von Lanna (Lugt 2773)
inscribed: In margin around oval: VRIHEJT MAECT BLYHEJT.

makers.displaydate: 1558–1617; born Mülbracht, Netherlands; died Haarlem, Netherlands
makers.displaymaker: Hendrick Goltzius, 1558–1617; born Mülbracht, Netherlands; died Haarlem, Netherlands

texts.textentryhtml: Pierre II Mariette [1634-1716, Lugt 1789]. Adalbert von Lanna [1836-1909, Lugt 2773]; sale of his collection, Stuttgart, May 11-22, 1909, lot 1843; Junius S. Morgan [1867-1932]; bequeathed to Princeton University Art Museum, 1932.
